directions: In a large pot over high heat, combine the water, potatoes, bouillon, celery and onion. Bring to a boil and cook until soft. Reduce heat to low and use a masher to mash down the potato mixture in the pot to desired consistency.
Add the soup and lightly whisk, until smooth. Add the cheese a little at a time, stirring often, until melted.
ingredients: 2 (10.75 ounce) cans  condensed cream of chicken soup
1 pound processed cheese food (eg. Velveeta), sliced
title: Cheese Soup IV
